Reviews.Title: “Customer service is terrible and they do not fulfill their promises.”

Reviews.Content: hotel overcharged credit card twice 100 charges contacted promised alleviate situation removing charges 4 phone calls week period fix mistake months havent fixed mistake ive paid 400 180 ive talk manager time ive called beware people obviously dont run credit card machine afford pay double
